titles.title: GUIDE Compliance Act
A bill to amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to provide procedures for guidance issued by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, and for other purposes.
Give Useful Information to Define Effective Compliance Act
GUIDE Compliance Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Give Useful Information to Define Effective Compliance Act or the GUIDE Compliance Act
This bill amends the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to require certain procedures for guidance issued by the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
